page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
WELCOME TO CARDEN MIDDLE SCHOOL'S {SECTION OF THE DOMESDAY PROJECT.}
Most of our area is chalky downland and includes the escarpment of the south downs.The land is almost entirely farmland worked by eight farms.There is also a sculptor who lives at Oakwood farm.He uses wood,stone and marble (see page 2).In westmeston there is a church which was built in the 12th century (see page 5).There are no emergency services in the village.The population of horses is greater than that of the people.Also in the area is Plumpton Agricultural College the land of which covers 1000 acres not all of which is in our area(see page 6&7).
